question: Which among the following is true about the trade agreements SAFTA & SAPTA? (SAFTA- South Asian Free Trade Area & SAPTA- SAARC Preferential Trading Arrangement)
option1: SAFTA is not related to SAARC
option2: SAFTA, came into being on 1 January 2006 replacing SAPTA
option3: SAPTA came into being on 1 January 2006 , replacing SAFTA
option4: SAFTA came into being in the Sixth Summit of SAARC held in Colombo
answer: SAFTA, came into being on 1 January 2006 replacing SAPTA
